long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ğŸ”¥ â­ï¸ 80k+ â­ï¸ Best AI Assistant From Github, Quick & Local-Focused AI Copilot.

https://github.com/ChatGPTNextWeb/ChatGPT-Next-Web

NextChat offers assistance in various tasks including searching, reading, writing, translating, drawing, and more.

ğŸ’ª The Key Features:
ğŸ‘‰ Chat with AI
âœ”ï¸ Multi chatbots support: chat with different LLM models such as OpenAI-o1, GPT-4o, Gemini-1.5, Claude-3.5, Claude-Instant, all in one place.
âœ”ï¸ Prompt Library: a prompt base that offers a large number of prompts; just hit '/' to quickly access your saved prompts.
âœ”ï¸ Real-Time Web Access: NextChat can answer with the latest internet info.
âœ”ï¸ Voice Input and Output Support: using microphone button to communicate with the AI in multiple languages.
ğŸ‘‰ Chat and Summary
âœ”ï¸ ChatPDF: upload a PDF and chat with PDF to better understand the content and quickly grasp the core highlight.
âœ”ï¸ Chat With Image: take a screenshot or upload an image and ask questions based on the content of the image, powered by GPT-4V.
âœ”ï¸ Webpage Summary: get accurate summaries without having to read entire webpage articles or information.
ğŸ‘‰ Search
âœ”ï¸ Search Agent: just ask a question, and NextChat can search using multiple keywords, review all the results, and find the right answer for you.
âœ”ï¸ Search Enhance: load ChatGPT answers next to search tools like Google and new Bing.
ğŸ‘‰ Write
âœ”ï¸ Compose: to create content like essays, reports, or ad copy, use "compose" to quickly generate customized paragraphs, adjusting length, format, tone, and language.
âœ”ï¸ Write agent: just provide a topic, and NextChat can automatically draft outlines for you, expanding the content with references.
âœ”ï¸ Email reply: in Gmail, NextChat analyzes emails content and suggests reply options, enabling you to send appropriate responses with just a click, no typing needed.
ğŸ‘‰ Translation
âœ”ï¸ PDF Translation: translate a PDF file and compare it side by side with the original file on the left and the translated file on the right.
âœ”ï¸ Parallel Translation: translate the current page information without covering the original text, so that both language versions can be compared to obtain accurate answers.
âœ”ï¸ Text Translation: select any text on any webpage to get accurate translation results in NextChat.
ğŸ‘‰ Creating Art
Convert your words into visuals. Just enter a short text, and you can become a painter.

ğŸ’» How to use NextChat:
ğŸ”¸ Click the "Add to Chrome" button in the upper right corner and pin it to the toolbar for easy access.
ğŸ”¸ Log in to your NextChat account.
ğŸ”¸ Press Option|Alt+N to wake up NextChat.
ğŸ”¸ Start working with NextChat!
â“ Frequently Asked Questions:
ğŸ“Œ What search engines are supported by NextChat?
Currently, we support search engines such as Google and Bing, and will support more search engines in the future.
ğŸ“Œ Do I need a ChatGPT/OpenAI account?
No, you do not need to have a ChatGPT account to use this extension. You can create a NextChat account for free at https://nextchat.dev.
ğŸ“Œ My country bans ChatGPT. Can I use NextChat in my country?
Yes, NextChat's chrome extension can be used in all countries.
ğŸ“Œ Can I use NextChat on my phone?
Yes, NextChat is available on all devices (Chrome Extension, Edge Extension, Mac OS, Windows, iOS, Android).
ğŸ“Œ Is NextChat free?
Yes, NextChat offers limited free usage. For unlimited access, you can choose the Premium Plan.

ğŸ“ª Contact us:
Any questions or suggestions? Please contact us at ğŸ’Œ business@nextchat.dev.
Try NextChat now and experience the powerful features of an AI assistant driven by ChatGPT!
